answers.answer: My daughter was born at 34+5 we stayed in hospital for 2 days. Absolutely nothing wrong, the only reason she stayed in was they wanted to make sure she was feeding and pooping properly :) she was never in an ICU always with me in my room. I know its not the same for everyone, we were very lucky.

Aww babe thats so good. Im glad she was ok. Im scared of hvin my baby away from me if it comes early. I pray every ones pregnancy lasts full term. Nd is healthy too.. how much did u little one weight?

With my first my son was born at exactly 35weeks. He was taken by emergency c section due to severe preeclampsia. He weighed 4lbs 7oz. He didn't have any problems whatsoever but still had to stay in the nicu for 6days. They wanted to make sure he continued to eat and gain weight. Plus he failed the car seat test so eventually they just discharged him and he had to be brought home in a car bed instead.

My daughter was born at 35 Weeks due to not getting oxygen like she should of been and was only 4lbs 7 oz. she did not go to nicu and came home after the 48 hours when I left. She just had to go get bloodwork daily for two Weeks because her bilirubin was high :)

Bless em .. I suppose besr time for them so far is after  27 weeks . At one point I want my baby at 27 weeks then the whole icu thing scares me . Wt do u all say should I prepare for it nd clean up nd wash up everything coz I dont hv ny one else to do it for me or shud I just wait nd see. X

question: Does any one know when is it  completely safe to have ur baby. I knw before 34 weeks something like that they keep babys in icu . But what about after that has any one had a baby about 36 weeks around that time and babys been fine and didn't need to stay in icu.. im 32 weeks 2days due in jan 6th but I hv a feeling this baby will come in another few weeks time im scared lol my husband keeps on say no no it shud be in jan coz his bday is on 3rd jan nd mine on 15th. .. as if the baby will wait for him .. joker
title: when's is it safe
